page.title: 04URMSTON MEADOWS
page.content: The meadows in Urmston is a place where people take their motorbikes to scramble because of the rough terrain. I sometimes go on my BMX to play. There are a lot of trees to climb and small beaches by the Mersey where we throw stones to the other side or make small rafts and follow them down the river. Every so often parts of the bank break away and fall into the Mersey. There is a fair bit of wildlife on the meadows, like birds,rabbits and bees,attracted to the wild flowers. People like to play on the golf course which is here and horse-riding is popular as there are many farms where the horses are looked after.
